## eemR

The **eemR** package implements various functions used calculate metrics
from excitation-emission matrix (EEM) as well as to preform
pre-processing corrections before PARAFAC analysis.

The latest release of the package from CRAN can be installed with:

``` r
install.packages("eemR")
```

The latest development version of the package can be installed with:

``` r
devtools::install_github("PMassicotte/eemR")
```

## Vignette

A detailed vignette presenting the package which can be viewed using:

``` r
vignette(topic = "introduction", package = "eemR")
```

## Supported spectrophotometers

At the moment, EEMs generated by the following spectrofluorometer are
officially supported.

- Cary Eclipse `.csv` files

- Aqualog `.dat` files

- Shimadzu `.TXT` files

- Fluoromax-4 `.dat` files

- Hitachi F-7000 FL `.TXT` files

EEM can be read using the
[`eem_read()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_read.md)
function. Please fill an
[issue](https://github.com/PMassicotte/eemR/issues) if you have other
file formats you would like to add to the package. You can also write
your own [import
function](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/articles/custom-import-function.md)!

# Package index

## All functions

- [`absorbance`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/absorbance.md)
  : CDOM absorbance data.
- [`eem()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem.md) : eem
  constructor
- [`eem_bind()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_bind.md)
  : Bind eem or eemlist
- [`eem_biological_index()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_biological_index.md)
  : Calculate the biological fluorescence index (BIX)
- [`eem_coble_peaks()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_coble_peaks.md)
  : Extract fluorescence peaks
- [`eem_cut()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_cut.md)
  : Cut emission and/or excitation wavelengths from EEMs
- [`eem_export_matlab()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_export_matlab.md)
  : Export EEMs to Matlab
- [`eem_extract()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_extract.md)
  : Extract EEM samples
- [`eem_extract_blank()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_extract_blank.md)
  : Extract blank EEM
- [`eem_fluorescence_index()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_fluorescence_index.md)
  : Calculate the fluorescence index (FI)
- [`eem_humification_index()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_humification_index.md)
  : Calculate the fluorescence humification index (HIX)
- [`eem_inner_filter_effect()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_inner_filter_effect.md)
  : Inner-filter effect correction
- [`` `eem_names<-`() ``](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_names-set.md)
  : Set the sample names of an eem or eemlist objects
- [`eem_names()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_names.md)
  : The names of an eem or eemlist objects
- [`eem_peaks()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_peaks.md)
  : Extract fluorescence peaks
- [`eem_raman_normalisation()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_raman_normalisation.md)
  : Fluorescence Intensity Calibration Using the Raman Scatter Peak of
  Water
- [`eem_read()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_read.md)
  : Read excitation-emission fluorescence matrix (eem)
- [`eem_remove_blank()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_remove_blank.md)
  : Blank correction
- [`eem_remove_scattering()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_remove_scattering.md)
  : Remove Raman and Rayleigh scattering
- [`eem_set_wavelengths()`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/eem_set_wavelengths.md)
  : Set Excitation and/or Emission wavelengths
- [`plot(`*`<eemlist>`*`)`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/plot.eemlist.md)
  : Surface plot of eem
- [`print(`*`<eemlist>`*`)`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/print.eemlist.md)
  : Display summary of an eemlist object
- [`summary(`*`<eemlist>`*`)`](http://pmassicotte.github.io/eemR/reference/summary.eemlist.md)
  : Display summary of an eemlist object
